channel.title: Minecraft Help
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape,
Cane and I recently started a minecraft help site and we are looking for some users to come over and check the site out, post, and have a good time ;) Are goal for this site is to create as many minecraft tutorials as possible. I've started creating video tutorials with voice-over but my first 10 minute video deleted itself and my microphone quit working so I am working on getting a new microphone. Until then though I will be working on the forums and other aspects of the website.
Maybe your wondering if we have a minecraft server, we are in the process of setting the vps up and it should be done by the end of today. We purchased it yesterday we just have to get the server up and running now and when we do I will edit this post accordingly.
So, if your interested, you can come check the site out at http://www.minecrafthelp.net
Hope to see ya there :rolleyes:
PS: If an administrator doesn't want this here then feel free to remove it and send me a pm.
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2i8x4qs.jpg[/img]

Get a skype or something so we can do vids togethar

@topic: looks nice, if I get a mic I might make a vid or two
[/quote]
I have a mic, so I can make vids.[/quote]

Send me a mic.
Hell, I probably have a mic. What should I make a tutorial about…

Cane and I recently started a minecraft help site and we are looking for some users to come over and check the site out, post, and have a good time Are goal for this site is to create as many minecraft tutorials as possible.
